name: Fractured American Idol 2007 Multiple Choice Quiz | Fractured TV | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Melinda Doolittle.

	My second favorite in Season 6, former back-up singer Melinda is from Tennessee. As of 2007 her favorite pop stars were Stevie Wonder, Jonny Lang, Donny Hathaway, Aretha Franklin, and Gladys Knight. Melinda came in third.

Lakisha Jones.

	Mom to Brionne, Lakisha is from Maryland. She has a HUGE beautiful voice. She came in fourth.

Jordin Sparks.

	The 2007 American Idol (and my Season 6 favorite), Jordin was only 17 when she walked away with the title. She's from Arizona. She stated that her favorite pop stars were John Mayer and Justin Timberlake.

Chris Sligh.

	In my opinion it was unfair of "America" to vote Chris out before Sanjaya and Haley. From South Carolina, Chris's favorite pop idols as of 2007 were Freddie Mercury, Ben Folds, Adam Duritz, Paul McCartney, Paul Meany, Jon Forman, Blake Lewis, Rudy Cardenas, Sheryl Crow, Imogen Heap, Fiona Apple, and Gina Glocksen.

Sanjaya Malakar.

	Only 17 in 2007, Sanjaya was apparently a teenaged heart-throb. Though cute and likeable, he was not (in my opinion) a very good singer. He left the show on April 18th.

Chris Richardson.

	This Justin Timberlake-esque crooner is from Virginia. As of 2007, his favorite pop stars were Jason Mraz, JT (is that James Taylor or someone else?), James Brown, Michael Jackson, Mariah Carey, and Christina Aguilera.

Gina Glocksen.

	Voted off April 4th, this Illinois rocker should not, in my opinion, have left before Sanjaya and Haley. As of 2007, Gina's favorite pop stars were U2, Green Day, Celine Dion, K.T. Tunstall, Kelly Clarkson, and Sheryl Crow.

Haley Scarnato.

	From San Antonio, Texas, Haley's singing and performing style are too Disneyland for me. I must admit that she's pretty. As of 2007, her favorite pop stars were Michael Jackson and Christina Aguilera. She left the show on April 11th.

Blake Lewis.

	Blake, who came in second, is from Washington state. He was the beatbox guy in the competition. As of 2007, his favorite male pop artists were Robbin Thicke, Jamaroqui, Maroon 5, Jason Mraz, U2, Gnarls Barkley, Half Past Forever, Michael Jackson, Prince, Sting, Eric Benet, Martin Sexton, Duncan Sheik, and M-Pact. His favorite female ones were Bjork, Fiona Apple, Imogen Heap, Estmerd, Jill Scott, Tori Amos, Ella Fitzgerald, and Sade.

Phil Stacey.

	A "pastor's kid" from Florida, Phil's favorite pop stars as of 2007 were Stevie Wonder, Marvin Gaye, Prince, Sting, Michael Jackson, Justin Timberlake, Robbie Williams, James Taylor, Vienna Teng, Sheryl Crow, Anastasia, Paula Abdul, "and, of course, Sir Paul McCartney."
